title: Business Practical Skills Enhancement: Video-Based Instruction (VBI) for Coffee Preparation Task Independence

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can independently perform at least two out of three attempts of the 19 steps in coffee preparation tasks using VBI
Learners can apply skills acquired through VBI to complete coffee preparation without errors in real work environments
Learners can self-monitor and correct task steps without external facilitation after using VBI
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
